about_the_game:
Introducing an exciting adult orientated Cyberpunk PC game featuring real adult content, real action and real adventure!

CyberpunkXXX is a STRICTLY 18+ X-Rated, third person action adventure game currently in early development.

WELCOME TO THE FUTURE

The year is 2065. The world is a very different place. A combination of war, corruption and climate change has ravaged civilisation as we know it. What is left of the remaining population live in vast settlement cyber cities dotted throughout the world comprised of various themed districts.

You will play as one of two available bounty droids hired to help the "Rebel Element", a small faction seeking to overthrow the "Governance" who have gained power through violence, intimidation and bribery after the great overthrow in 2030.

Using a combination of violent force, infiltration and sexual manipulation you will have to travel from district to district altering the delicate balance of power while ensuring your own continued survival. The odds are greatly stacked against you, but with a vast range of weaponry at your disposal including vehicles and Mech robots as well your own seductive powers you are the "Rebel Element's" last remaining hope.

Peel back the layers of the story and discover if your mission really is in the best interests of the subjugated population.

Discover the unique districts and locations dotted around the game world.

Experience intimate encounters, full on explosive action and a gripping story arc throughout your journey.

Guaranteed Content Already Included:

  • 18+ X-Rated content

  • Fast paced action and adventure gameplay

  • A large futuristic district to explore

  • Many Bars and Clubs to enjoy

  • A large variety of weapons

  • Stealth, melee and ranged combat

  • Driveable vehicles

  • Full day/night cycle and realistic weather effects

  • Beautifully modelled streets and buildings

  • A large range of characters and enemies

  • All sexual tastes included

  • Character development

Work In Progress (Based on community requests)

  • Additional districts

  • Environment interactions

  • Driveable mechs

  • Expanded campaign mode

  • More sexual encounters

  • Cinematic cutscenes

  • Survival & RPG elements

Story Mode: Play as a Cyborg mercenary seeking to overturn the "Governance", the ruling elite currently controlling the population. Go from quest to quest as you see fit. You decide how you accomplish the missions given to you.

Open World Mode: Discover the beautiful districts, perilous Governance buildings and sleazy clubs at your own pace. Feel free to explore the many Entertainment Cyborgs (EnBorgs) and love centres dotted throughout the city.

We are a two man developer team currently working hard to complete this awesome game. If you want to support us and are interested in CyberpunkXXX please add it to your wishlist.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nudity and depictions of sexual acts. This game also contains acts of violence against robot security personnel including the use of guns, grenades, rocket launchers, knives and bats. There will be locations that have alcohol and medical marijuana on display.

name: CyberpunkXXX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 / 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 3Gb Video Ram
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 / 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 8Gb Video Ram

Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: CyberpunkXXX is a third person 18+ adult action adventure set in a dystopian cyberpunk style world. You play as one of two Bounty Droids hired by an underground rebel force to help overthrow the ruling dictatorship. Use weapons, vehicles and melee combat to achieve your objectives.
